title: JUSTICAR ZED SKIN!!!!!
body:
RIOT PLZ

http://imgur.com/oCi1IBz

I want everyone to know that this was NOT my idea, My friend sent it to me and I thought it would be cool if riot made it.
I didn't design the picture, but I have an idea of what all the skills will look like, just want everyone to know this.
If this gets made I give FULL credit to the designer, I just wanted to show to the world what an amazing idea it is.



After thinking about it for a while I have the specs,
melee hist slice through the enemy with white streaks that fade from the sides instead of blood, and when u stab it in the enemy it looks like the enemy gets surrounded in white for half a sec

Q -after it goes out it leaves a small streak of white fogyish appearance behind it and every enemy iy hit it makes a zap sound or something with white blood effects.

W-could be a blue glowing shadow that has with aura appearances running through him.

E-would be really cool looking, instead of him just spinning his blades around i thought that maybe the blades can curve for a sec when he does it making it look a bit like a scythe and then slices through all the enemy's near by with blue splashes around him and the same white blood appearance as his basic hits.

R would be really cool,  and when he activates it instead of straight X lines they could be curved like that scythe. and once the ult is done it could look like a blue light with little light blue lights running through it and it will get bigger and bigger till the aftershock of his ult activates with white blood instead of red.

I thought these would be really cool specs, anyone else can add to it if they want!
